alert.note: Alert for Oak Creek and Sycamore Canyons; Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 10 at 3:18PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Yavapai County north of Cottonwood through 345 PM MST... At 318 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Clarkdale, or 13 miles west of Sedona, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds near 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clarkdale, Cottonwood, Dead Horse Ranch State Park and Tuzigoot National Monument. This includes State Route 89A between mile markers 358 and 361. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Oak Creek and Sycamore Canyons; Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins
